name: Famicom Mini: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima
summary: Famicom Mini: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2004 by Nintendo. It is a conversion of Hudson Soft's Famicom game Adventure Island. The game was not released in America or Europe, and thus was exclusive to Japan. It was part of the Famicom Mini Series that re-released a variety of classic Famicom games for the Game Boy Advance.
